name: ASHTON FIRE DISTRICT v. LOCAL 2725, I.A.F.F., AFL/CIO
name_abbreviation: Ashton Fire District v. Local 2725, I.A.F.F.

parties: ASHTON FIRE DISTRICT v. LOCAL 2725, I.A.F.F., AFL/CIO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
Pursuant to the respondents’ motion, the petition for writ of certiorari is dismissed as moot, the writ heretofore issued is quashed and the record herein is ordered returned to the State Labor Relations Board.
MURRAY, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Francis R. Foley, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Edward T. Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
ASHTON FIRE DISTRICT v. LOCAL 2725, I.A.F.F., AFL/CIO.
No. 80-7-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 12, 1981.
Francis R. Foley, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Hogan & Hogan, Edward T. Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Providence, for respondent.
